title: Jan Kuciak: Soldier jailed for 23 years for journalist's murder
title_page: Jan Kuciak: Soldier jailed for 23 years for journalist's murder - BBC News
maintext: It was the first such targeted killing of a journalist in Slovak history. The killing led to widespread anti-corruption protests that forced then-Prime Minister Robert Fico and the country¡¯s chief of police to step down.
